section.title: The definite article (the)
section.sectiontitle: Use the with superlatives and to talk about something you have already mentioned.
section.text1a: He's the best player in the team.
section.text2a: She has two dogs. The black one is called Mungo.
section.sectiontitle2: Use the to talk about particular things or people. Don't use the to talk about things or people in general.
section.text3: The apples fell off the tree yesterday.
section.text4: The nurses in this hospital are nice.
